page.title: 19LEISURE IN FLITWICK 2
page.content: YOU CAN ENJOY YOURSELF IN FLITWICK IN MANY DIFFERENT WAYS. THERE ARE SEVERAL FACILITIES AVALIBLE THAT OFFER VARIED ACTIVITIES: FLITWICK LAWN TENNIS CLUB, FLITWICK SPORTS CENTRE, FLITWICK SQUASH CLUB, THE VILLAGE HALL AND OTHER CHURCH HALLS. {CHILDRENS ACTIVITES: }MARXMAN, GIRLS AND BOYS BRIGADE, CUBS, SCOUTS, BROWNIES, GUIDES, MUSIC SCHOOL, JUDO, KARATE, YOUTH CLUB, FISHING AND DANCING. {ADULTS ACTIVITIES:} JUDO, FISHING, KARATE, FOOTBALL, COMPUTER CLUBS, SQUASH CLUB, TENNIS CLUB, BABMINTON, MUSIC SCHOOL AND DANCING. {GUIDES IN FLITWICK THERE IS A GUIDES HUT. I ENJOY GOING TO GUIDES. THERE IS A LOT TO DO.WE MAKE THINGS, COOKING, PLAYING OUTSIDE AND EARNING BADGES.
